title: Did a Florida Sheriff’s Deputy Die ‘Suspiciously’ After Criticizing David Hogg?
subtitle: Several dubious web sites complained about a "media blackout" surrounding Jason Fitzsimons' death after he criticized a Parkland shooting survivor.
author: Arturo Garcia
vclaim: Broward County Sheriff's Deputy Jason Fitzsimons died suspiciously after posting a photograph criticizing Parkland shooting survivor David Hogg.
